verses.verse: I Exhort <S%G3870><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> I 1473 P-1NS The 3588 T-NSM Prisoner 1198 N-NSM In The 1722 PREP Lord, 2962 N-DSM Worthily 516 ADV To Walk 4043 V-AAN Of The 3588 T-GSF Calling 2821 N-GSF Wherewith 3739 R-GSF Ye Were Called, 2564 V-API-2P

With <S%G3326><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Humility <S%G5012><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Meekness, <S%G4236><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Longsuffering, <S%G3115><s%> Bearing With <S%G430><s%> One Another <S%G240><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Love; <S%G26><s%>

Being Diligent <S%G4704><s%> To Keep <S%G5083><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Unity <S%G1775><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bond <S%G4886><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Peace. <S%G1515><s%>

One <S%G1520><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye Were Called <S%G2564><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Hope <S%G1680><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2821><s%> Of Your Calling; <S%G5216><s%>

<S%G1520><s%> <S%G1161><s%> But To Each One <S%G1538><s%> Of Us <S%G2257><s%> Was Given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Measure <S%G3358><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Gift <S%G1431><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> He Says, <S%G3004><s%> Having Ascended Up <S%G305><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> High <S%G5311><s%> He Led Captive <S%G162><s%> Captivity, <S%G161><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> Gifts <S%G1390><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Men. <S%G444><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But That <S%G1161><s%> He Ascended, <S%G305><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Is It <S%G2076><s%> <S%G1487><s%> But <S%G3361><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> He Descended <S%G2597><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lower <S%G2737><s%> Parts <S%G3313><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth? <S%G1093><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> Descended <S%G2597><s%> The Same <S%G846><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Ascended <S%G305><s%> Above <S%G5231><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens, <S%G3772><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He Might Fill <S%G4137><s%> <S%G3588><s%> All Things; <S%G3956><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Some <S%G3303><s%> Apostles, <S%G652><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And Some <S%G1161><s%> Prophets, <S%G4396><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And Some <S%G1161><s%> Evangelists, <S%G2099><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And Some <S%G1161><s%> Shepherds <S%G4166><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Teachers, <S%G1320><s%>

With A View To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Perfecting <S%G2677><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Saints; <S%G40><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Work <S%G2041><s%> Of The Service, <S%G1248><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Building Up <S%G3619><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

Until <S%G3360><s%> We May Arrive <S%G2658><s%> <S%G3588><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> At <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Unity <S%G1775><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Knowledge <S%G1922><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> At <S%G1519><s%> A Man <S%G435><s%> Full Grown <S%G5046><s%> At The <S%G1519><s%> Measure <S%G3358><s%> Of The Stature <S%G2244><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Fulness <S%G4138><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> No Longer <S%G3371><s%> We May Be <S%G5600><s%> Infants, <S%G3516><s%> Being Tossed <S%G2831><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Carried About <S%G4064><s%> By Every <S%G3956><s%> Wind <S%G417><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Teaching <S%G1319><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sleight <S%G2940><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Men, <S%G444><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Craftiness <S%G3834><s%> With A View To <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Systematizing <S%G3180><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Error; <S%G4106><s%>

<S%G226><s%> But Holding The Truth <S%G1161><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> We May Grow Up <S%G837><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In All Things, <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Head, <S%G2776><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ : <S%G5547><s%>

From <S%G1537><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Body, <S%G4983><s%> Fitted Together <S%G4883><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Compacted <S%G4822><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Joint <S%G860><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Supply <S%G2024><s%> ' According To The <S%G2596><s%> Working <S%G1753><s%> In Its <S%G1722><s%> Measure <S%G3358><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Of Each One <S%G1538><s%> Part, <S%G3313><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Increase <S%G838><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> Makes For Itself <S%G4160><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The Building Up <S%G3619><s%> Of Itself <S%G1438><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Love. <S%G26><s%>

This <S%G5124><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> I Say, <S%G3004><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Testify <S%G3143><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> No Longer <S%G3371><s%> <S%G5209><s%> That Ye Walk <S%G4043><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rest, <S%G3062><s%> The Nations, <S%G1484><s%> Are Walking <S%G4043><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The Vanity <S%G3153><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3563><s%> Of Their Mind, <S%G846><s%>

Being Darkened <S%G4654><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Understanding, <S%G1271><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> Alienated From <S%G526><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ignorance <S%G52><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Is <S%G5607><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hardness <S%G4457><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Of Their Heart, <S%G846><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> Having Cast Off All Feeling, <S%G524><s%> Themselves <S%G1438><s%> Gave Up <S%G3860><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Licentiousness, <S%G766><s%> For The <S%G1519><s%> Working <S%G2039><s%> Of Uncleanness <S%G167><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Craving. <S%G4124><s%>
<S%G5210><s%> But Ye <S%G1161><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Learned <S%G3129><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

If Indeed <S%G1489><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Ye Heard <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Were Taught, <S%G1321><s%> According As <S%G2531><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The Truth <S%G225><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus; <S%G2424><s%>

<S%G659><s%> For You To Have Put Off <S%G5209><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Former <S%G4387><s%> Conduct <S%G391><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Old <S%G3820><s%> Man, <S%G444><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Is Corrupt <S%G5351><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Desires <S%G1939><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Deceit; <S%G539><s%>
To Be Renewed <S%G365><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3563><s%> Of Your Mind; <S%G5216><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> To Have Put On <S%G1746><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> New <S%G2537><s%> Man, <S%G444><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Was Created <S%G2936><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Holiness <S%G3742><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Truth. <S%G225><s%>

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> Having Put Off <S%G659><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Falsehood, <S%G5579><s%> Speak <S%G2980><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> Each <S%G1538><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4139><s%> His Neighbour, <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> We Are <S%G2070><s%> Of One Another <S%G240><s%> Members. <S%G3196><s%>

Be Angry, <S%G3710><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Sin; <S%G264><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sun <S%G2246><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Let Not Set <S%G1931><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3950><s%> Your Provocation, <S%G5216><s%>
Neither <S%G3383><s%> Give <S%G1325><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Devil. <S%G1228><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> Steals <S%G2813><s%> No More <S%G3371><s%> Let Him Steal, <S%G2813><s%> <S%G3123><s%> But Rather <S%G1161><s%> Let Him Labour, <S%G2872><s%> Working <S%G2038><s%> What Is <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> <S%G3588><s%> With His Hands, <S%G5495><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> He May Have <S%G2192><s%> To Impart <S%G3330><s%> To Him That <S%G3588><s%> Need <S%G5532><s%> Has. <S%G2192><s%>

Any <S%G3956><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Corrupt <S%G4550><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> Your Mouth <S%G5216><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Let Go Forth, <S%G1607><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> For <S%G4314><s%> Building Up <S%G3619><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Respect Of Need, <S%G5532><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> It May Give <S%G1325><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> To Them That <S%G3588><s%> Hear. <S%G191><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Grieve Not <S%G3076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Ye Were Sealed <S%G4972><s%> For The <S%G1519><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Of Redemption. <S%G629><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> Bitterness, <S%G4088><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Indignation, <S%G2372><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wrath, <S%G3709><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Clamour, <S%G2906><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Evil Speaking <S%G988><s%> Let Be Removed <S%G142><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> You, <S%G5216><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Malice; <S%G2549><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> And Be <S%G1161><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> One Another <S%G240><s%> Kind, <S%G5543><s%> Tender Hearted, <S%G2155><s%> Forgiving <S%G5483><s%> Each Other, <S%G1438><s%> According As <S%G2531><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Forgave <S%G5483><s%> You. <S%G5213><s%>
